name: Half Moon (2021)
description:
Waking up in a hospital bed after a few days of coma, a boy had to accept the hard unfair fate fell upon him, crippled for life. Enraged, despaired and filled with vengeances he curses, imagines and dreams about retaliations for those who had sentenced him in his forever prison. And then... something happened, his dreams starting to occur, taken form in reality. One of his bullies died in the most horrifying ways, exactly like how he had dreamed it. How is that possible? When all he can do was dreaming about it, while chained on his wheelchair? Does that mean his other dreams also will come true? Will his choices send him to the path of redemptions or will they pull him into the dark side?

Half Moon is a short visual novel made in one month by Team Dangya for Novejam 2021 event.

CONTENT WARNING: Mild violence, a lot of swearing, visual images including death and blood. Please be cautious if you're sensitive to these things.

  • Genre: Psychological thriller
